p.k: Among Israel's many musical discoveries is Shalosh: three young musicians with an electrifying sound. Shalosh plays raw, edgy jazz with a rock attitude, in which tender melodies accompany complex rhythms.
p.d: Since its opening in 1992, jazz club Moods has developed into one of Zurich's largest and most prominent cultural venues. At the same time, it has become one of Europe's prominent jazz clubs which today enjoys a well-deserved worldwide reputation among musicians and critics. The venue books a large variety of genres, ranging from jazz and soul to electronic and international music. Among Israel's many musical discoveries is Shalosh: three young musicians with an electrifying sound. At Moods, Shalosh plays raw, edgy jazz with a rock attitude, in which tender melodies accompany complex rhythms.
